node.title: nodelet
node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `nodelet` ( `nodelet_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nltext` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `nlcode` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `updateinterval` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `parent_container` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `lastupdate` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`nodelet_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
